Communication Action Group bug v0.1.1
When 2 antenna are symmetric and toggle antenna is in action group,
They do NOT toggle.

I've also had problems with action groups after the first patch. So far "toggle deploy" and "toggle roll/pitch/yaw" on control surfaces don't work and "toggle motor" and "toggle steering" don't work for wheels. These were all on some kind of symmetry. I tried reverting and loading and checked that the action groups were set up right. No luck. Other action groups which  had been set up at the same time still worked. 

My pc:

OS: Windows 10 Home, version 22H2

CPU: 12th Gen Intel(R) Core(TM) i5-12400F   2.50 GHz

GPU: AMD Radeon RX 6600

RAM: 16GB

Mods: none

I have the same Problem with "toggle deploy surface control" for wings but found a way to prevent this from happening.

The action seems to be serialized, meaning it applies the toggle for each part listed in the command, but the symmetry still applies. In other words, if you have an even amount of symmetric parts, the toggle will be applied for ALL parts n-times and thus cancelling out.

You simply need to only have one of the symmetric parts in the action manager and you're good to go
